post.author: 신민용

comment.author: thomas lee
comment.content: I enjoyed your humour. You're funny

post.content:
To be honest, . << March >> I'm willing to change myself, but the world is not ready for that. . << April >> If you make a big laughter at boring stuff, either you must be out of mind or you are a phony. . << May >> The dove that had lived in the mountain decided to go to the city for a change and challenging something for his life, and he ended up becoming a good cooked meal for hungry wolf. Change & challenging is not always good. . << Jun >> I'd prefer to find one good way instead of finding 10,000 ways that doesn't work. . << July >> The sad thing is that I'm too busy to have time enjoying life. . << August >> I don't wanna create the universe becase I don't want to make any apple pies, besides I'm not capable of doing that like GOD. .
HEEE~~~ I'm just kidding. They are just useless argument for fun. Did you know it is not 'arguement' but it is 'argument'?
post.title: RE: Quote of the Week
